channel.title: FLF - The Rebel Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Spine of Scripture with Dominic Bnonn Tennant [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
This week P Nate has a special guest lined up all the way from New Zealand. From the future, Dominic Bnonn Tennant, Husband, Father, Pastor, Author, Theologian comes on to discuss his paradigm shifting book The Spine of Scripture. You can follow Bnonns blog at bnonn.com or his co-work with Dr. Michael Foster at https://itsgoodtobeaman.com/. 

To support the show you can become a Fight Laugh Feast Club Member here: flfnetwork.com/membership/

You can also join the rebellion by sharing and inviting your friends to like the content on facebook: facebook.com/rebelpodcast or by supporting us through patreon at patreon.com/reformedrebel
item.author: Pastor Nate
item.itunes:author: Pastor Nate

item.title: Election Apologetics [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
P Nate and Elder P sit down without an agenda and talk through some of the implications of the doctrines of grace. In a new church family there will be differences of opinion with some key doctrines so the Rebels discuss what leads them, biblically and practically to embrace and love reformed soteriology.

 

To support the show you can become a Fight Laugh Feast Club Member here: flfnetwork.com/membership/

 

You can also join the rebellion by sharing and inviting your friends to like the content on facebook: facebook.com/rebelpodcast or by supporting us through patreon at patreon.com/reformedrebel
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels

item.title: End Abortion - It Starts Right Now! [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
This week P Nate and Pootie invite a guest to Garage Mahal. Right Now president and co-founder Scott Hayward joins the guys to discuss the current state of abortion laws in Canada and how you can help fight to end the murder of preborn children in Canada.

www.itstartsrightnow.ca  to join Right Now.

For more information on abortion visit the Canadian Centre for Bio-ethical Reform website at 

https://www.endthekilling.ca/
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris with guest Scott Hayward
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris with guest Scott Hayward

item.title: Leaders Are Readers! [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
Transitioning out of the series on Paradigm Shifts in Faith, P Nate, Pootie and Air Jordan get together to discuss books and resources that will help listeners dig deeper into some new theological perspectives they may have heard or just generally good books the Rebels read this year that they recommend for your spiritual growth.

To support the show you can become a Fight Laugh Feast Club Member here: flfnetwork.com/membership/

You can also join the rebellion by sharing and inviting your friends to like the content on facebook: facebook.com/rebelpodcast or by supporting us through patreon at patreon.com/reformedrebel
